snippet.title: Blinky Bill's Ghost Cave (longplay) for PC
snippet.description:
Came also out for:

---


Game description:

Blinky Bill's Ghost Cave is a interactive book game based on the Blinky Bill cartoon episode of the same name.

The home of the rabbit family is too small and now it is up to Blinky Bill and his friends to find a new home for them...and they do, unfortunately that home they found is filled with ghosts....or is it?

Mr. Wombat can read the story to you or you can "play" the book, so the story gets told and in each page you interact with the characters and environment by clicking on them.
There is also a colouring book. various puzzles (some of which train your memorization) and some information about animals that are living in Australia.
